professional_access.title: Professional Access, Non-stop Availability
professional_access.description: We provide premium access to crypto trading for both individuals and institutions through high liquidity, reliable order execution and constant uptime.

api.title: A Range of Powerful APIs
api.description: Set up your own trading interface or deploy your algorithmic strategy with our high-performance FIX and HTTP APIs. Connect to our WebSocket for real-time data streaming.

support.title: Customer Support
support.description: Premium 24/7 support available to all customers worldwide by phone or email. Dedicated account managers for partners.

safety.title: Safety, security and compliance
safety.description: NEFA is a licensed New York trust company that undergoes regular bank exams and is subject to the cybersecurity audits conducted by the New York Department of Financial Services. Learn more about our commitment to security.

keys.title: Hardware security keys
keys.description: With NEFA you can secure your account with a hardware security key via WebAuthn.

certifications.title: SOC Certifications
certifications.description: NEFA is SOC 1 Type 2 and SOC 2 Type 2 compliant. We are the worldâ€™s first cryptocurrency exchange and custodian to complete these exams.

fund.title: Fund

buy_crypto.title: Buy Crypto
buy_crypto.description: Buy Bitcoin or Ethereum, then securely store it in your Wallet or send it on easily to your friends anywhere

1.question: Why should I choose NEFA?
1.answer: We're industry pioneers, having been in the cryptocurrency industry since 2016. We've facilitated more than 21 billion USD worth of transactions on our exchange for customers in over 40 countries. Today, we're trusted by over 8 million customers around the world and have received praise for our easy-to-use app, secure wallet, and range of features.
